import { Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user', templateUrl: './user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user.component.scss'], }) export class UserComponent { @Input() name = '' @Input() status = '' @Input() url = '' isOnline = false online = true }
